content.description: Sit start with a pair of edges. From there, ascend the face using the arete to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is good, but there is a rock that makes it uneven.
content.location: It climbs the east side of Untrue Burial's northeast arete.

content.description:
Sit start with a low left hand edge and a right hand sidepull on the large, vertical feature. From there, bump the feature, then gain a pair of edges, connect with the finish of

Archangel

, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is great starting out but has a rock behind the finish.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Untrue Burial.

content.description: Sit start with a pair of edges and a good right foot. From there, pull up to a left hand gaston, follow to the crack with the right hand, and continue up using the generous features to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The immediate landing is great, but there's a rock behind the problem.
content.location: It climbs the center of Untrue Burial's east face.
